column4: OK. A simple, but vital question, I think: I have a DELL Latitude D800 (or, any other random laptop). I don't have an external microphone that I plugged in. I just want to record sound from the device built into my laptop. What should I turn on in "Volume Control"? Micriphone? Capture? Line-In? Something else?
you need to use the recording not playback tab
But what should I enable there?
have you just tried each thing? also check in edit>preferences that they are all ticked
try running alsamixer from the command line for a more retro mixer
then press tab to go to recording
i think it's space to select the one you want
I don't "want" something. I "need" something, to make it work, and I don't know what is the one I need. :)
well try each one in turn, every computer is different
